#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Tees.

== Name ==

*[CTees Tees]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Tees (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Set of tees from which a golf course can be played.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  colour = xs:string  date-from = xs:date  date-to = xs:date  gender = [SGolfingGender GolfingGender]  
            *name = xs:string*
            units = [SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum]>  ([CHoleQualification qualification], [CTee tee]{1,18}, [CVersion version]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CHoleQualification golfml:HoleQualification] || [CHoleQualification qualification] ||  					Qualification of the hole for handicaping purposes.				 ||
|| [CTee golfml:Tee] || [CTee tee] ||  Description of a single hole. ||
|| [CVersion golfml:Version] || [CVersion version] ||  					Records tee set modifications over time.				 ||

|| xs:string || `colour` ||   ||

|| xs:string || `name` ||   ||
|| [SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum golfml:UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum] || `units` ||   ||
